definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: On the internet, broken links are abundant.
sentences.chinese: 在互聯網上，失效鏈接如汗牛充犢。

sentences.english: This link represents the network access that the server provides to the virtual system.
sentences.chinese: 該鏈接代表了服務器提供給虛擬機系統的網絡訪問。

sentences.english: Welcome to the Evangelical Formosan Church of Philadelphia resource link repository.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到費城臺服基督教會網路資源鏈接庫。

sentences.english: You can use the “source” links to read more on each battle.
sentences.chinese: 你可以點擊“來源”鏈接，閱讀這些戰爭的更多內容。

sentences.english: Read the links above, become informed, weigh the evidence.
sentences.chinese: 請讀一讀上面的鏈接，自知，然後權衡。

sentences.english: I'm looking for a link builder for a brazilian mini games site.
sentences.chinese: 我正在尋找一個爲巴西迷你遊戲網站鏈接建設者。

sentences.english: Run the Database Wizard and re-link the shape to correct the problem.
sentences.chinese: 運行“數據庫嚮導”並重新鏈接形狀以更正此問題。

sentences.english: Dead link to send a request, the server returns a 404 error page.
sentences.chinese: 死鏈接發送請求時，服務器返回404錯誤頁面。

sentences.english: Property is empty, the link to the password recovery page is not available to the user.
sentences.chinese: 屬性爲空，則不向用戶提供密碼恢復頁鏈接。

sentences.english: Besides adding text, you can add tags and hyperlinks to the note.
sentences.chinese: 除文本外，還可以在便籤中添加標記和超鏈接。

sentences.english: Type the text that appears as a hyperlink in your document.
sentences.chinese: 鍵入在文檔中作爲超級鏈接顯示的文本。

sentences.english: Try making multiple blogs and 'sso have them most link to one main site.
sentences.chinese: 可嘗試羣建博客並充分誑騙其反向鏈接。

sentences.english: Then, put lots of links to various websites within the image.
sentences.chinese: 然後，在這個圖片裏放一堆鏈接，連到各種網站去。

sentences.english: The page where the link is placed on must be minimum PR4 or above.
sentences.chinese: 所在的鏈接放在最少要有個PR4以上的頁面。

sentences.english: Links are not to be spammy.
Allocates the memory and stores the linkage's name.
sentences.chinese: 分配內存並存儲鏈接名稱。

definition: official website (abbr. for 官方網站|官方网站[guan1 fang1 wang3 zhan4])
to sign up/to enter one's name/to apply/to register/to enroll/to enlist
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
